DocAttribute.Name: Identification
DocAttribute.Documentation: A unique identification assigned to an asset that enables its differentiation from other assets. > NOTE  The asset identifier is unique within the asset register. It differs from the globally unique id assigned to the instance of an entity populating a database.

DocAttribute.Name: OriginalValue
DocAttribute.Documentation: The cost value of the asset at the time of purchase.

DocAttribute.Name: CurrentValue
DocAttribute.Documentation: The current cost value of the asset.

DocAttribute.Name: TotalReplacementCost
DocAttribute.Documentation: The total cost of replacement of the asset.

DocAttribute.Name: Owner
DocAttribute.Documentation: The name of the person or organization that 'owns' the asset.

DocAttribute.Name: User
DocAttribute.Documentation: The name of the person or organization that 'uses' the asset.

DocAttribute.Name: ResponsiblePerson
DocAttribute.Documentation: The person designated to be responsible for the asset. > NOTE  In some regulations (for example, UK Health and Safety at Work Act, Electricity at Work Regulations), management of assets must have a person identified as being responsible and to whom regulatory, insurance and other organizations communicate. In places where there is not a legal requirement, the responsible person would be the asset manager but would not have a legal status.

DocAttribute.Name: IncorporationDate
DocAttribute.Documentation:
The date on which an asset was incorporated into the works, installed, constructed, erected or completed. > NOTE  This is the date on which an asset is considered to start depreciating.

DocAttribute.Name: DepreciatedValue
DocAttribute.Documentation: The current value of an asset within the accounting rules and procedures of an organization.
